i am an environmental engineer.

participant_2.background:
I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world.
I am a legal assistant who loves to bake and cook in my country home.
I lost everything when the economy crashed.
I am grateful for my parents' support and encouragement.
i like to play soccer.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I'm good, thank you for asking! How are you?
Doing well, thank you! I love the Beatles! What are some of your favorite songs by them?
I love too many to choose just a few, but I'd say Yesterday, A Hard Day's Night, and Hey Jude are probably my top three.
All great choices! I'm partial to Strawberry Fields Forever, Come Together, and I Want to Hold Your Hand.
Those are great too! I love how they're all so different from each other, but they're all still so good.
Me too! I think that's what makes them so special.
I agree. So, what do you do for a living?
I'm an environmental engineer. I love my job because it allows me to have a positive impact on the environment.
That's awesome! I'm a legal assistant who loves to bake and cook in my country home.
That sounds like a great job! I love to bake too, but I don't have a country home.
Maybe you'll have one someday! I know I love mine.
I hope so! I love the idea of having a place where I can relax and cook without having to worry about anyone else.
It's the best! I love spending time in my kitchen and coming up with new recipes.
Me too! I love trying new recipes and seeing how they turn out.
It's so much fun! I'm glad we both have such a passion for cooking.
Me too! It's one of my favorite things to do.
Mine too! I'm sure we could be great friends, if you're ever in my area, please let me know! I'd love to cook you dinner!
That's so kind of you! I'd love to try your cooking! I'll definitely let you know if I'm ever in your area.
Great! I'm looking forward to it
